events.description: European stocks rebounded on Friday following a lackluster start to the session.

events.event_name: US FDA Action against Copycat Drugs
events.description: The US FDA threatened action against illegal copycat drugs, impacting pharmaceutical stocks.
Stellantis announced a major restructuring to accelerate electric and hybrid vehicle rollouts.

facts.fact_text: The STOXX 50 index climbed 0.7% and the STOXX 600 rose 0.4% on Friday.

evidences.evidence_text: European equities rebounded on Friday, with the STOXX 50 climbing 0.7% and the STOXX 600 rising 0.4%

facts.fact_text: Stellantis shares dropped by 27% following a financial warning.

evidences.evidence_text: Stellantis plunged 27% after warning it expects to take a €22 billion hit

facts.fact_text: Novo Nordisk shares increased by more than 5%.

evidences.evidence_text: Novo Nordisk jumped more than 5% after the US FDA threatened action against illegal copycat drugs.

facts.fact_text: Orsted reported a 9.8% annual increase in revenues.

evidences.evidence_text: Orsted advanced 1.7% following a 9.8% annual increase in revenues.

claims.claim_text: The market recovery was driven by easing concerns regarding AI disruption and high valuations.

evidences.evidence_text: The recovery came as concerns over AI-related disruption and lofty valuations appeared to ease

claims.claim_text: Stellantis expects a €22 billion financial impact from its business restructuring.
claims.author: Stellantis

evidences.evidence_text: warning it expects to take a €22 billion hit from restructuring its business

claims.claim_text: Societe Generale's financial results were considered disappointing.

evidences.evidence_text: Societe Generale fell 3.8% after its results disappointed.

evidence.evidence_text: The recovery came as concerns over AI-related disruption and lofty valuations appeared to ease
Stellantis plunged 27% after warning it expects to take a €22 billion hit from restructuring its business
investors continued to assess a fresh round of corporate updates.
